metadata.title: CVE-2018-16425 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A double free when handling responses from an HSM Card in sc_pkcs15emu_sc_hsm_init in libopensc/pkcs15-sc-hsm.c in OpenSC before 0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: opensc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.0~rc1-1').
